name: Get_Room_List

hotel_id.description:
hotel_id can be retrieved from api/v1/hotels/searchHotels(Search Hotels) or api/v1/hotels/searchHotelsByCoordinates(Search Hotels By Coordinates
) endpoint in Hotels collection.

arrival_date.description: The date on which you will arrive or check-in

departure_date.description: The date of departure or check-out.

adults.description: The number of guests who are 18 years of age or older. The default value is set to 1.

children_age.description:
The number of children, including infants, who are under 18.
Example:
Child 1 Age = 8 months
Child 2 Age = 1 year
Child 3 Age = 17 years
Here is what the request parameter would look like:
children_age: 0,1,17

room_qty.description: The number of rooms that are required. The default value is set to 1.

units.description: The measurement of distance in metric or imperial.

temperature_unit.description:
The temperature unit in Fahrenheit or Celsius.
c = Celsius
f = Fahrenheit

languagecode.description:
To obtain the response data in a specific language, enter the languagecode. languagecode can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getLanguages(Get Languages
) endpoint in Meta collection.

currency_code.description: The currency code. currency_code can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getCurrency(Get Currency) endpoint in Hotels collection.

location.description: location can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getLocations(Get Location) endpoint in Meta collection.

Supplements are not calculated automatically in the total costs and will have to be paid for separately during your stay.
The maximum number of cots, extra beds and children allowed in existing beds may vary depending on the option you book.

Children 12 years and above will be charged as adults at this property.
To see correct prices and occupancy information, please add the number of children in your group and their ages to your search.

7471721.description:
These sea-facing suites offer views of the Arabian Sea. With a living area, bedroom and a marble-finished bathroom with a tub, these suites also feature a balcony that overlooks the Gateway of India. 

The suites include:
- Access to buffet breakfast at the Sea Lounge
- High-tea at the Palace Lounge from 15:00 to 17:00
- Daily evening cocktail hours at the Palace Lounge from 18:00 to 19:00
- Service of hot and soft beverages at the Palace Lounge from 07:00 to 23:00
- Complimentary one-way airport transfer 
- Ironing for two pieces of garments per stay
- Convenience of early check-in (post 09:00) and late check-out (until 18:00) (subject to availability)
- A two-hour complimentry access to a meeting room at the business center per stay (subject to availability with prior reservation)

children_at_the_property.text: Children of any age are welcome.
Children 12 years and above will be charged as adults at this property.
To see correct prices and occupancy information, please add the number of children in your group and their ages to your search.

7471725.description: Offering free toiletries and bathrobes, this triple room includes a private bathroom with a walk-in shower, a bidet and a hairdryer. The air-conditioned triple room offers a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a minibar, a tea and coffee maker, a safe deposit box as well as city views. The unit offers 1 bed.

The air-conditioned triple room offers a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a minibar, a tea and coffee maker, a safe deposit box as well as sea views. The unit offers 1 bed.

response_summary:
Here’s a clear summary of the API response for hotel room bookings in Mumbai:

The hotel offers several room options with sea views, including the **Superior Room Sea View King Bed** and the **Deluxe Room Sea View King Bed**, both suitable for single occupancy. 

**Pricing and Policies:**
- **Superior Room**: Priced at approximately **$765** (₹65,450) for the stay, with breakfast included. Additional meals like lunch and dinner cost **$58** each. Taxes and charges add around **$138** to the total.
- **Deluxe Room**: Costs about **$865** (₹73,950) for the stay, also with breakfast included. Taxes and charges are approximately **$156** extra.  
- **Cancellation Policy**: Free cancellation is available until **June 8, 2025** (Mumbai timezone). After that, the first night's cost will be charged if canceled within 2 days of arrival. No-show fees apply similarly.  
- **Prepayment**: A partial prepayment for the first night is required 2 days before arrival.  

**Room Features:**
- **Size**: Rooms are around **26 m² (279 ft²)** with extra-large double beds (181-210 cm wide).  
- **Amenities**: Free WiFi, air conditioning, ensuite bathrooms, bathrobes, and safety deposit boxes.  
- **Views**: Stunning sea views of the Arabian Sea or Gateway of India.  
- **Children Policy**: Kids of all ages are welcome, but those 12+ are charged as adults. Cribs are free, while extra beds for older children cost **$35.08 per night**.  

**Additional Notes:**
- The hotel provides **airport shuttle services, a swimming pool, and free WiFi** as top benefits.  
- Prices are displayed in USD but are converted from INR, so actual charges may vary slightly.  
- Early check-in and late check-out may be available upon request.  

For travelers looking for a comfortable stay with flexible cancellation, these options provide a good balance of luxury and convenience.
enhance_func_desc: This API is ideal for travelers booking hotel accommodations. It retrieves detailed room options for a specific hotel, including pricing, amenities, and policies. Users can filter by dates, guest count (adults/children), and room quantity. The response includes room features, cancellation terms, and additional costs, helping travelers make informed booking decisions. The hotel ID must be obtained from the SearchHotels API.

enhanced_parameters.hotel_id: Unique identifier for the hotel, sourced from searchHotels or searchHotelsByCoordinates.
enhanced_parameters.arrival_date: Check-in date for the hotel stay.
enhanced_parameters.departure_date: Check-out date for the hotel stay.
enhanced_parameters.adults: Number of adult guests (18+ years). Default is 1.
enhanced_parameters.children_age: Ages of children (under 18) separated by commas.
enhanced_parameters.room_qty: Number of rooms required. Default is 1.
enhanced_parameters.languagecode: Language preference for the response data.

policies.description: List of policies related to the hotel booking

content.description: Detailed description of the policy terms and conditions

class.description: Category or type of the policy, e.g., cancellation policy

refund_during_fc.description: Details about the refund policy during the free cancellation period

title_details.description: Title details for the refund policy during free cancellation

translation.description: Translated text indicating full refund during free cancellation

tag.description: Tag identifying the type of clarification for full refund during free cancellation

placeholder_translation.description: Placeholder text for translation indicating full refund during free cancellation

included_taxes_and_charges_amount.description: Details of the included taxes and charges amount for the booking.

amount_unrounded.description: Unrounded amount of included taxes and charges in USD.

value.description: Numerical value of the included taxes and charges.

amount_rounded.description: Rounded amount of included taxes and charges in USD.

currency.description: Currency code for the included taxes and charges (e.g., USD).

charges_details.description: Details of additional charges for the booking.

translated_copy.description: Human-readable description of the additional charges.

currency.description: Currency code for the charge amount (e.g., USD).

value.description: Numerical value of the charge amount.

gross_amount_hotel_currency.description: Gross amount of the booking in the hotel's local currency.

value.description: Numerical value of the gross amount.

currency.description: Currency code for the gross amount (e.g., INR).

net_amount.description: Net amount of the booking in USD.

currency.description: Currency code for the net amount (e.g., USD).

value.description: Numerical value of the net amount.

gross_amount_per_night.description: Gross amount per night of the booking in USD.

value.description: Numerical value of the gross amount per night.

amount_rounded.description: Rounded gross amount per night in USD.

currency.description: Currency code for the gross amount per night (e.g., USD).

amount_unrounded.description: Unrounded gross amount per night in USD.

has_long_stays_monthly_rate_price.description: Indicates if the booking has a long-stay monthly rate price (0 = no, 1 = yes).

has_long_stays_weekly_rate_price.description: Indicates if the booking has a long-stay weekly rate price (0 = no, 1 = yes).

nr_stays.description: Number of stays for the booking.

key.description: Key for the price display configuration (e.g., use_nightly_prices).

value.description: Value for the price display configuration (e.g., 0 = no, 1 = yes).

gross_amount.description: Gross amount of the booking in USD.

value.description: Numerical value of the gross amount.

currency.description: Currency code for the gross amount (e.g., USD).

benefits.description: List of benefits included in the booking.

excluded_amount.description: Excluded amount (e.g., taxes and charges) for the booking in USD.

value.description: Numerical value of the excluded amount.

currency.description: Currency code for the excluded amount (e.g., USD).

all_inclusive_amount_hotel_currency.description: All-inclusive amount of the booking in the hotel's local currency.

currency.description: Currency code for the all-inclusive amount (e.g., INR).

value.description: Numerical value of the all-inclusive amount.

all_inclusive_amount.description: All-inclusive amount of the booking in USD.

value.description: Numerical value of the all-inclusive amount.

currency.description: Currency code for the all-inclusive amount (e.g., USD).

items.description: List of items included in the booking (e.g., taxes, charges).

ar_items.description: Details of an item included in the booking.

details.description: Additional details of the item (if any).

name.description: Name of the item (e.g., Goods & services tax).

amount_unrounded.description: Unrounded amount of the item in USD.

value.description: Numerical value of the item amount.

amount_rounded.description: Rounded amount of the item in USD.

currency.description: Currency code for the item amount (e.g., USD).

inclusion_type.description: Inclusion type of the item (e.g., excluded).

nr_adults.description: The number of adults included in the hotel room booking.

children_ages.description: An array containing the ages of any children included in the booking. If empty, no children are included.

ar_items.description: The age of a child included in the booking.

children_ages.description: List of ages of children staying in the room. Empty if no children are staying.

ar_items.description: Age of a child in years.

extrabed_available_amount.description: Cost of an extra bed if available. Null if extra beds are not available.

name.description: Full name of the room including occupancy type and cancellation policy.

is_smart_deal.description: Indicates if the room is part of a smart deal (0 = No, 1 = Yes).

room_surface_in_feet2.description: Size of the room in square feet.

must_reserve_free_parking.description: Indicates if free parking must be reserved in advance (0 = No, 1 = Yes).

number_of_bedrooms.description: Number of bedrooms in the room. 0 indicates a single room.

all_inclusive.description: Indicates if the room rate is all-inclusive (0 = No, 1 = Yes).

smoking.description: Indicates the smoking policy for the room (2 = Non-smoking).

deposit_required.description: Indicates if a deposit is required (0 = No, 1 = Yes).

babycots_available_amount.description: Cost of a baby cot if available. Null if baby cots are not available.

can_reserve_free_parking.description: Indicates if free parking can be reserved (0 = No, 1 = Yes).

is_genius_deal.description: Indicates if the room is part of a Genius deal (Null = Not applicable).

bh_room_highlights.description: List of highlights or features of the room. Empty if no highlights are specified.

ar_items.description: A highlight or feature of the room.

name_without_policy.description: Name of the room excluding the cancellation policy.

roomtype_id.description: Unique identifier for the room type.

is_mobile_deal.description: Indicates if the room is part of a mobile deal (0 = No, 1 = Yes).

refundable_until.description: Date and time until which the booking is refundable, in the Mumbai timezone.

nr_children.description: Number of children staying in the room.

is_last_minute_deal.description: Indicates if the room is part of a last-minute deal (0 = No, 1 = Yes).

fit_status.description: Status indicating the fitness of the room for booking (2 = Available).

number_of_bathrooms.description: Number of bathrooms in the room. 0 indicates a single bathroom.

package_id.description: Unique identifier for the package if applicable. 0 indicates no package.

is_domestic_rate.description: Indicates if the rate is domestic (0 = No, 1 = Yes).

extrabed_available.description: Indicates if an extra bed is available (0 = No, 1 = Yes).

is_dormitory.description: Indicates if the room is a dormitory (0 = No, 1 = Yes).

b_bsb_campaigns.description: List of campaigns or promotions applicable to the room. Empty if no campaigns are active.

pod_ios_migrate_policies_to_smp_fullon.description: Internal flag for policy migration (0 = Not migrated).

full_board.description: Indicates if the room rate includes full board (0 = No, 1 = Yes).

genius_discount_percentage.description: Percentage discount for Genius members. 0 indicates no discount.

refundable.description: Indicates if the booking is refundable (0 = No, 1 = Yes).

is_block_fit.description: Indicates if the room is part of a block fit (0 = No, 1 = Yes).

is_flash_deal.description: Indicates if the room is part of a flash deal (0 = No, 1 = Yes).

max_occupancy.description: Maximum number of occupants allowed in the room.

block_id.description: Unique identifier for the room block.

half_board.description: Indicates if the room rate includes half board (0 = No, 1 = Yes).

nr_stays.description: Number of stays booked for the room.

max_children_free.description: Maximum number of children that can stay for free.

room_count.description: Total number of rooms available for this type.

room_surface_in_m2.description: Size of the room in square meters.

breakfast_included.description: Indicates if breakfast is included in the room rate (0 = No, 1 = Yes).

mealplan.description: Details of the meal plan included in the room rate.

nr_adults.description: Number of adults staying in the room.

max_children_free_age.description: Maximum age of children that can stay for free.

babycots_available.description: Indicates if baby cots are available (0 = No, 1 = Yes).

adults.description: Number of adults included in the booking.

children.description: List of children included in the booking. Empty if no children are included.

ar_items.description: Details about a child (e.g., age or name), though the array is empty in this example.

model.description: Indicates the type or category of the hotel room booking model, such as 'classic'.

check_in_out.description: Details about check-in and check-out options

early_check_in.description: Availability of early check-in (e.g., upon request)

late_check_out.description: Availability of late check-out (e.g., upon request)

total_extra_bed_price.description: Total price for all extra beds in the booking currency (e.g., USD). Zero indicates no extra beds are booked.

children.description: Number of children included in the booking. Zero indicates no children are booked.

adults.description: Number of adults included in the booking. Default is 1 for single occupancy.

number_of_extra_beds_for_children.description: Number of extra beds requested for children. Zero indicates no extra beds for children are booked.

extra_babycots_price.description: Total price for baby cots in the booking currency (e.g., USD). Zero indicates no baby cots are booked.

extra_beds_for_adults_price.description: Total price for extra beds for adults in the booking currency (e.g., USD). Zero indicates no extra beds for adults are booked.

babies.description: Number of babies included in the booking. Zero indicates no babies are booked.

number_of_extra_beds_for_adults.description: Number of extra beds requested for adults. Zero indicates no extra beds for adults are booked.

number_of_extra_beds_and_babycots_total.description: Total number of extra beds and baby cots combined. Zero indicates none are booked.

extra_beds_for_children_price_in_hotel_c.description: Price for extra beds for children in the hotel's local currency (e.g., INR). Zero indicates no extra beds for children are booked.

extra_beds_for_adults_price_in_hotel_cur.description: Price for extra beds for adults in the hotel's local currency (e.g., INR). Zero indicates no extra beds for adults are booked.

number_of_extra_babycots.description: Number of baby cots requested. Zero indicates no baby cots are booked.

block_id.description: Unique identifier for the room block or booking. Format appears to combine hotel ID, room ID, and other metadata.

extra_beds_for_children_price.description: Price for extra beds for children in the booking currency (e.g., USD). Zero indicates no extra beds for children are booked.

total_extra_bed_price_in_hotel_currency.description: Total price for all extra beds in the hotel's local currency (e.g., INR). Zero indicates no extra beds are booked.

extra_babycots_price_in_hotel_currency.description: Price for baby cots in the hotel's local currency (e.g., INR). Zero indicates no baby cots are booked.

qualifies_for_no_cc_reservation.description: Indicates whether the reservation qualifies for no credit card requirement (0 = No, 1 = Yes).

average_room_size_for_ufi_m2.description: Average room size in square meters for the hotel property.

currency_code.description: Currency code used for pricing (e.g., INR for Indian Rupees).

cheapest_avail_price_eur.description: Cheapest available room price in Euros.

cvc_required.description: Indicates whether a CVC code is required for booking (1 = Yes, 0 = No).

b_legal_use_neutral_color_for_persuasion.description: Legal flag for UI color usage (0 = No, 1 = Yes).

hotel_id.description: Unique identifier for the hotel property.

max_rooms_in_reservation.description: Maximum number of rooms allowed in a single reservation.

use_new_bui_icon_highlight.description: Flag for UI icon highlighting (1 = Enabled, 0 = Disabled).

total_blocks.description: Total number of room blocks available for booking.

is_exclusive.description: Indicates whether the property is exclusive (null = Not specified).

tax_exceptions.description: List of tax exceptions applicable to the booking.

duplicate_rates_removed.description: Indicates whether duplicate rates were removed (0 = No, 1 = Yes).

is_cpv2_property.description: Indicates whether the property is part of CPV2 (1 = Yes, 0 = No).

cc_required.description: Indicates whether a credit card is required for booking (1 = Yes, 0 = No).

address_required.description: Indicates whether an address is required for booking (0 = No, 1 = Yes).

recommended_block_title.description: Title for the recommended room block (e.g., 'Recommended for 1 adult').

last_matching_block_index.description: Index of the last matching room block (-1 = Not applicable).

is_tpi_exclusive_property.description: Indicates whether the property is TPI exclusive (0 = No, 1 = Yes).
